attributes.action: Change Rules On SIPS Pensions To All Us To Buy Property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have £60k sitting in a pension I no longer pay into as I am unemployed due to the credit crunch. 

Over the past year it has lost more than £30k, so is an awful investment. 

I want to move that money into a SIPS pension, and then purchase a studio flat which I intend to rent out. 

The flat would earn £400 a month, which I would also reinvest in stocks and shares.

However, as the rules for SIPS pensions were changed. I can not invest this money.

Crazy. Just crazy! At a time when there is no credit around, and the lower end of the property market is in a slump. There must be thousands like me who would love to invest their pensions in property. 

Not only would this get the bottom end of the property market going. It would also be a great long term investment for me. 

Mr Brown, please look at doing this and doing it soon.

rejection.details:
Pls. amend title of petition ( should it be 'to allow us'...?) and resubmit.
Thanks
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
